actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain losses from shoreline erosion shall be deductible for purposes of the individual income tax.

summary.text: Provides that losses in excess of $500 from shoreline erosion incurred by the individual taxpayer shall be deductible for purposes of the income tax imposed under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain losses from shoreline erosion shall be deductible for purposes of the individual income tax.
